document.full_text: at saturday night's annual inner circle charity dinner, which will feature skits performed by the city hall press corps and the mayor of new york city, mr. bloomberg will incorporate some elements from "spider-man" into his act.
document.title: bloomberg may spoof 'spider-man' at charity event
lines_and_colors: at saturday night's annual inner circle charity dinner, which will feature skits performed by the city hall press corps and the mayor of new york city, mr. bloomberg will incorporate some elements from "spider-man" into his act.
